topics.body:
Dear diary:

I'm going to rethink whether or not I'm wasting my life on video games, cause when you reach the point in video gaming where you defeat a boss who is throwing nuclear bombs at you while you're fighting in hell over the burning souls of the damned and you have to *dodge* said nuclear bombs like neo and you win that's a clear sign that maybe you need to rethink how much time you're spending on video games. . .
